name: Hot Room
author: Mero
info: This script allows for a screen flag to cause the extreme heat time in OOT when you die if you run out of time.
description: This script allows for a screen flag to cause the extreme heat time in OOT when you die if you run out of time.
setup: 1. Set the constants to be compatible with your quest and other scripts.2. Combine the scripts, you simply need to include Update_HotRoom() in the main loop of the active global script.3. To initialize the hotroomtimer simply set the screen flag you assign to the constant HOTROOM_FLAG.4. It is cleared if you have the item with the ID number equal to the constant I_FIRETUNIC, or when you enter a screen without the flag set.Requires std.zh and string.zh.
